latex:
If an integer $n > 8$ is a solution of the equation $x^2 - ax+b=0$ and the representation of $a$ in the base-$n$ number system is $18$, then the base-$n$ representation of $b$ is\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 18 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 20 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 80 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 81 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 280$
